ques: The _________ of innocent civilians shocked the world.

The surprise _________ caught the enemy off guard.
The enemy army decided to _________ our territory.
The bomb was set to _________ in ten seconds.

He threw a powerful _________ at his opponent's face.

The acts of _________ left scars on the survivors.

The _________ forces fought for their independence.
The enemy forces launched a massive _________.
They built fortifications to _________ against invaders.
The empire was determined to _________ new lands.
They negotiated the terms of their _________.
The minefield was dangerous, as any step could cause it to _________.
The medic treated the soldier's _________.
The assassin silently approached his target and _________ed him.
The enemy forces carried out a brutal _________.
He loaded his weapon with _________ before the battle.
The walls were designed to _________ the city from attack.
The _________ of animals for meat is a common practice.
_________ is a critical supply for any military operation.
The city's _________ was a turning point in the war.

The _________ required immediate attention.

They planned a coordinated _________ on the enemy stronghold.
The hostages endured hours of sheer _________.

The victim suffered a deep _________ wound.

His _________ was so strong that it broke the glass.

He chose to _________ rather than face certain death.

The organization was responsible for spreading _________.

The fireworks are expected to _________ with a burst of color.

They used strategy and force to _________ their enemies.

They watched the slow-motion replay of the _________.
The troops were ordered to _________ the enemy's land.
The general refused to accept the enemy's _________.
